messages: b02357229eb736cb23462fd284893648 (14:41): any idea how to enable mouse ptr based text selection in nano? works in vim
b02357229eb736cb23462fd284893648 (14:42): i can select text with my mouse in vim
cdbd8fab257a057480813b01e4aa2779 (14:42): But perhaps you mean something entirely different, your sentence isn't easy to get :)
b02357229eb736cb23462fd284893648 (14:49): what should be the entry for /dev/cdrom in /etc/fstab so that it mounts using iso9660 for normal cds and cdfs for vcds
b02357229eb736cb23462fd284893648 (14:49): where shud i ask this question
b02357229eb736cb23462fd284893648 (15:10): samuel: for this ?? --  what should be the entry for /dev/cdrom in /etc/fstab so that it mounts using iso9660 for normal cds and cdfs for vcds
c34c6fb6c7d39f855706da16cf21003f (15:15): max_: what the hell are you doin asking that in #vim?
c34c6fb6c7d39f855706da16cf21003f (15:19): is there any support for "remote control" in vim a la emacsclient?
c12e5a67790c1795d06688638d9c3972 (15:25): When I set a colorscheme in Vim-6.3, the background won't change. Only the foreground colors will change. I'm using xterm.
d5a09a7f1a424d040c110a0bca8546de (15:39): since i updated vim some time ago on debian it cant color code anymore, how come
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (15:42): Did you maybe edit some of the system vimrc files?#
c12e5a67790c1795d06688638d9c3972 (15:51): So... nobody can tell me why vim's colorscheme with light background colors won't work in my xterm?
c12e5a67790c1795d06688638d9c3972 (15:56): LeoNerd: foreground colors will work; background will stay black, reguardless of the colorscheme
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (15:56): Vim isn't in control of xterm's background. That's for xterm to decide
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (15:57): :set bg   just tells vim "my background is dark/light", which hints it to select light/dark colours to cope
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (15:57): :set bg=dark   <== tells vim to choose light colours
ded01cf47cdca62f9adcfd25cb1b3127 (15:57): vim can change the xterm background colour
c12e5a67790c1795d06688638d9c3972 (15:57): LeoNerd: so: i want to use normally black bg for xterm. But a light one when I use vim... how to?
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (15:58): OH.. different colour for vim? Hrm...
c12e5a67790c1795d06688638d9c3972 (16:04): LeoNerd: how do I set that in my .vimrc?
865e041781435a532cdf4df2ab2d6ef7 (16:21): is it possible to  move all '{' that are present at the end of line to new line ?
